kpi.name: M1022C70

kpi_info.title: DELAY BUILDUP INDICATIONS SENT DUE TO HW OVERLOAD
kpi_info.use: The number of "Congestion indication control frame - delay build up" sent to BTS due to RNC HW overload congestion control functionality. When the RNC Frame Protocol entity sends "Congestion Indication control frame - delay build-up" indication to the base station and the indication was triggered by congestion detected by HW overload congestion control functionality.

kpi.kpi_alias: DELAY BUILDUP INDICATIONS SENT DUE TO HW OVERLOAD
